raw_comment:
I notice that your legacy and income does have an impact on your application status. I also noticed that students with hard working parents were more likely to be admitted by 2-7 times. 

I wonder how many students were taken into account for every income category, low medium, and high income. Because if more students were recorded for the high income applications compared to low income, this could change the data slightly. I also wonder how this data would change today if it was recorded in the past 5 years. 

This relates to my community because there are a wide range of incomes and alumni families. Making admission more competitive for different students. I also go to a public school, and I know those that go to private schools are very dedicated to their education because they can afford to. So I wonder how many of these students came from public vs. private schools. 

Does your family legacy and income really impact your application status?
ace_sentences: I notice that family legacy impacts application status.
I notice that family income impacts application status.
I notice that students who have hard-working parents are more likely to be admitted.
I notice that these students are 2 times to 7 times more likely to be admitted.
I wonder how many students are in each income category.
The income categories are low income and medium income and high income.
If more students are recorded in the high-income category than in the low-income category then the data could change slightly.
I wonder how the data would change today.
I assume that the data was recorded more than 5 years ago.
I wonder how the data would change if it was recorded in the past 5 years.
This relates to my community.
My community has a wide range of incomes.
My community has many alumni families.
This makes admission more competitive for different students.
I go to a public school.
Some students go to private schools.
I know that students who go to private schools are very dedicated to their education.
I think that these students can afford to be dedicated to their education.
I wonder how many students came from public schools.
I wonder how many students came from private schools.
I ask whether family legacy and family income really impact application status.
